Summary Note:
Angela Concha Ramos and the RM crossed paths at a tech conference in Madrid. They attended several keynote sessions together and realized they had a shared vision for the future of technology investments.
Angela Concha Ramos is a 54 year old Gallery Owner from Spain.
She was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
Family Background: Angela Concha Ramos and Romero have been married since 2006. Their child is  named Dácil.
Education Background:
Angela graduated from Colegio El Pilar Getafe in 1988.
Angela received her degree from Madrid School of Fine Arts in 1993.
Occupation History:
Angela Concha Ramos is a 54 year old Gallery Owner from Spain.
At CaixaForum, Angela Concha Ramos held the position of Art Dealer from 1995 to 1998, developing essential skills in the field.
In 1999, she moved to Museo del Prado to work as a Gallery Owner, applying her knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 290000 EUR, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
She has villa located in Málaga, worth 2050000 EUR.

She purchased condo in Vigo, where she spends her holidays. It is valued at 1090000 EUR.
In 2005, she received an inheritance of 1090000 EUR from her late grandfather, who was a prominent Neurosurgeon, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: In summary, Angela has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
